name: Tone Consistency
description: Tests the model's ability to maintain a consistent tone and voice throughout a presentation

prompts.text: Create a presentation for a board meeting about quarterly financial results. Maintain a formal, professional tone throughout all slides. The presentation should include an executive summary, key performance indicators, revenue breakdown, expense analysis, and future projections.

Create a presentation for middle school students about the solar system. Use a friendly, engaging, and educational tone throughout. Make complex concepts accessible without being condescending. Include fun facts on each slide to maintain student interest.

terminology_consistency.description: Consistent use of terminology and vocabulary

audience_appropriateness.description: Consistent appropriateness for the target audience
